page.title: 08FARMING IN SANDBACH
page.content: THE MAJORITY OF THE LAND WITHIN OUR 12 KILOMETRE BLOCK IS FARMLAND.{FARMING} IN THE AREA HAS CHANGED OVER THE YEARS.AT ONE TIME THERE WAS OVER 30 FARMS IN THE AREA BUT NOWADAYS MANY OF THE FARMS ARE FARMED BY ONE FAMILY E.G. FIELDS FARM,BRINDLEY GRANGE FARM AND BRINDLEY GREEN FARM IS NOW A SINGLE 300 ACRE FARM.HOWEVER,THIS HAS NOT HAPPENED IN ALL CASES AND A TRIP DOWN THE BACK COUNTRY LANES OF SANDBACH HEATH REVEALS A NUMBER OF {SMALL HOLDINGS}RANGING FROM 15-22 ACRES IN SIZE."MIXED" FARMING IS THE MOST POPULAR FORM OF FARMING. MOST OF THE LARGER FARMS KEEP OVER 100{DAIRY {CATTLE,}ESPECIALLY FRESIANS.ARCLID HALL FARM IN PARTICULAR CONCENTRATES ON MILK PRODUCTION OVER 200 DAIRY COWS AND{ARABLE}LAND PROVIDING WINTER FODDER.
